meta.desc: This article is about the distribution of the library

ul.li: jfxConverter.jar: jar file containing the core jfxConverter code
jfxConverter-ppt.jar and associated lib directory: the PowerPoint driver and the POI library
jfxConverter-svg.jar and associated lib directory: the SVG driver and the Batik library
jfxConverter-eps.jar and associated lib directory: the EPS driver and the jlibeps library
